about_the_game:
🌱 OrePlant: A Magical Fantasy World Awaits! ✨

Curious Ffin and Maru are drawn into a magical fantasy world by a mysterious force! 🌀 There, the legendary World Tree stands tall, and your touch will gradually bring this mystical land back to life. 🌳 With the help of your adorable companion, Aria, explore and nurture this enchanting world!

🛠️ Key Features

💎 Mineral Farming

Experience a unique mineral cultivation system instead of traditional farming! Combine and grow various minerals to discover new resources.

🍳 Cooking and Crafting

Use the minerals you've grown and resources you've collected to craft useful tools and items or create special recipes!

🎣 Fishing and Exploration

Explore the corners of the fantasy world, catch various fish, and embark on a journey to uncover hidden secrets.

🏡 Decorating and Building

Decorate your farm and personalize your space with charming items and decorations. Let your creativity shine!

😌 Relaxing Idle Gameplay

Even when you're not actively playing, the world keeps growing. Progress at your own pace and watch your land thrive.

🌟 Recommended For

  • Players who love relaxing and healing games

  • Fans of adorable graphics and creative customization

  • Those who enjoy diverse gameplay styles like farming, fishing, and cooking

  • Fans of games like Stardew Valley or Rusty Retirement will absolutely love it! 🐾

OrePlant invites you to unleash your creativity and bring a magical world back to life! 🌈
🖼️ Your story begins beneath the legendary World Tree. 🌟

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (Integrated) or Vulkan-compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realteak

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (Integrated) or Vulkan-compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realteak

short_description: 🌱 OrePlant is an idle simulation game where you grow minerals on your farm! 🎣 Fish, 🍳 cook, and 🏡 decorate while exploring a fantasy world centered around the legendary World Tree. Join your adorable companions Ffin and Aria on a relaxing and magical journey! 🌟
